Text:
Thanks Again!

So whats the scoop on the Anonymous Download option? It prompts me for permission on a .exe file.......

Season1 over already?? wow.

Cmon gordon you can do better.

Gordon Ramsay is awesome!!

@GrokkoW,
don't do the anonymous download program- it's some stupid worthless program that also stealth installs a toolbar on your browser that's impossible to uninstall/completely remove... I had to go right into my system files to remove it completely, after googling how to get rid of it >:l
I figured it was bad news as soon as I saw it was asking me to install an application just to "anonymously" download a .torrent. Had bullshit written all over it.
